#summary PrIter API.

= System Property Parameters =

|| *property* || *type* || *default* || *description* ||
|| "mapred.job.iterative" || boolean || false || set iterative processing ||
|| "mapred.iterative.topk" || integer || 1000 || specify the number of interested top records ||
|| "mapred.iterative.output.wearfactor" || float || 10 || the ratio of the computation to the overhead ||
|| "mapred.iterative.snapshot.interval" || integer || 10000 || the time interval of snapshot generation ||
|| "mapred.iterative.reduce.emitsize" || integer || 100 || the initial output queue size ||
